scripts.backup: docker exec mongo_server bash -c "mongodump -u admin -p admin --authenticationDatabase admin -o /backup/dump  && tar -C /backup/dump -zcvf /backup/all.tar.gz . && rm -rf /backup/dump/*"
scripts.restore: docker exec mongo_server bash -c "tar -C /backup/store -zxvf /backup/all.tar.gz && mongorestore -u admin -p admin --authenticationDatabase admin --drop /backup/store/ && rm -rf /backup/store/*"
